amendatorysection.catchline: Warrants for payment of expenses and compensation; issuance.
amendatorysection.para: Warrants for the payment of expenses and compensations provided by sections 81-8,184 to 81-8,208 shall be issued by the Director of Administrative Services upon presentation of vouchers drawn by the chairman, but at no time shall the total amount of warrants exceed the total amount of fees collected as provided by the provisions of sections 81-8,184 to 81-8,208.
